name: Murder Generation: Cream City Chaos
description: Ride a wave of nostalgia into the heart of the Milwaukee punk scene with 'Murder Generation: Cream City Chaos'. In this arcade-style game reminiscent of the '80s and '90s, you'll journey with the band to iconic local venues like Last Rites, Cactus Club, and The Port of Kenosha. Take on 13 adrenaline-pumped levels of mayhem, confronting friends and foes alike. As you fight to the beat of lo-fi 8-bit renditions of Murder Generation's entire song catalogue, masterfully reimagined for the game, you'll navigate an array of adversaries and obstacles. Earn your place as a punk icon, staking your claim in the chaos of Cream City. 'Murder Generation: Cream City Chaos' blends the old-school arcade experience with a raw, punk aesthetic, delivering a gameplay experience as unforgettable as the anthems that soundtrack it.
